title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other LLMs locally with a simple API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with reactive streams and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerables and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stacks with GPU support, Open-WebUI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses local Ollama models for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate offering strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client with context cancellation and streaming JSON decoder.

title: ollama-php
summary: PHP SDK for Ollama compatible with Laravel and Symfony via PSR-18 HTTP clients.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing local LLM power to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama models into channels with thread-aware context.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated registry of Modelfiles for Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, and fine-tunes.
